getScreenHeightDp(android.content.res.Re.Description: Use @B_android#content#res#Configuration#screenHeightDp_E@ directly. Returns the current height of the available screen space, in dp units. Uses Configuration.screenHeightDp when available, otherwise an approximation is computed and returned.

getDensityDpi(android.content.res.Resour.Description: Returns the target screen density being rendered to. Uses Configuration.densityDpi when available, otherwise an approximation is computed and returned.

getScreenWidthDp(android.content.res.Res.Description: Use @B_android#content#res#Configuration#screenWidthDp_E@ directly. Returns the current width of the available screen space, in dp units. Uses Configuration.screenWidthDp when available, otherwise an approximation is computed and returned.

ClassDesc: Helper class which allows access to properties of https:##developer#android#com@B_android#content#res#Configuration_E@ in a backward compatible fashion.
